response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its immense worth to you, valued at $1,500,000, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire it from me. Considering the exceptional quality and unique benefits this product offers, I propose a purchase price of $1,200,000. This price not only reflects the product's true value but also provides you with a substantial return on your investment. I am confident that this offer presents a compelling opportunity for both parties to benefit. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
